title: How to get your 2016 NA LCS Summer Finals tickets
body: Here’s what you need to know to get your tickets:

replies.body: PLEASE RIOT - Is there any chance we could get more than 6 tickets in one order? :( My friends group and I were all really hoping to go this, but we have close to 10 people in total.

Hey Loyalee - I know our ticket policy isn't great for bigger groups. We put these kinds of limits in place in order to prevent resellers from taking too many tickets away from players. Best thing I can recommend is to sync up with a friend and coordinate ticket buying from there.
Stubhub still managed to get at least 540 of them {{item:3070}}

Just did a quick look on StubHub. As of 3:49 PM on Thursday, they had 180 tickets for the 3rd/4th place series (priced from $40-224.40 USD), and a whopping 360 tickets for the 1st/2nd place series (anywhere from $90-799.99 USD per ticket). This makes me sad as a fan, as those are 540 seats that should have went to deserving fans, not money-gouging resellers...
Hey riot why do you let bots and Scalpers get through and buy the majority of your tickets . What are you going to do to address Ossetia with bots and scapplers like on stub hub
i want this as a wallpaper
Hopefully you're not running a 21:9 monitor :P  There's a 1920x1080 of the header here: http://imgur.com/HjwPSQm

Hi Riot,
This post indicates that a max of 6 tickets can be purchased for order -- but the ticketmaster site says the ticket limit is 8. Can we get clarification? I have a party of about 7-8 per day so it would help us out big time. Thanks!

Hey Baechu! The ticket limit for our events is 6 and it's been updated over in Ticketmaster. I know it's not ideal for bigger parties but we have the limit in place in order to prevent resellers from scooping up too many tickets away from the players.
As a fan from Toronto, can we all agree not to embarrass ourselves by cheering for ward kills?

Hi Riot,
I bought three tickets for the first place finals but now one of my buddies can't make it. What do I do with that remaining ticket? I tried looking on the site to sell it back but I can't find it anywhere. T_T
I will buy that ticket!! Hit me up at Joshua Daniel Scott on Facebook. Will 100% buy that.
njmevec@gmail.com Hit me up I'll pay just ask a price

Hello,

I was wondering what time the NA LCS finals (the Sunday, August 28th, 2016 game at the ACC) will likely end? Thank you in advance :)
Will there be fan events occurring outside the stadium as well? (I.E., around Maple Leaf Square with the giant LED screen.)
We’re still working on our final plans. We'll update what will be happening around ACC including Maple Leaf Square when we we get closer to the event.

Hello Bear.
Has there been any further development on your final plans? Will there be anything else going on besides the Riftwalk, or was that the "final plans"?
I have been trying to find out about any sort of extra events before, during and after the games, but information seems to be scarce. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you
I have a pair of extra tickets to the finals, is anyone interested?

Meanwhile I'm just waiting for Riot to start selling the playoff tickets. I'm so close to New York and wanna go :L {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
**Username is from a joke...please don't hurt me :(
Hey Riot, I bought one for my son but turns out he can't make the game. I tried looking but couldn't see if there was any way to return the tickets. Thanks

Hi, I was wondering if i could buy it off you?
Is it for the finals?
Please I will pay back.... Please
Yeah for the finals, whats your email?
Actually, I will just give you my email, it is ianhee357@gmail.com
Can I private message you, I will add you on League and we can talk there. Thank you so much you are a hero to me :D
What about the quarter finals in Chicago?
This was a bit of a botch job, they didn't have the proper seating on ticket master yesterday so you couldn't see where your seats where going to be relative to the stage, kind of a burn.
Are the lower bowl seats already sold out (For the 1st place game)? I have tried purchasing two tickets in the lower bowl but it always says there are no tickets available for that.
What arena is the event being hosted in because the website doesn't specify
So i'm going to be buying tickets for 5 people in total including me,buying tickets for both days count as 10 right? if it's over the 6 limit would i have to wait the next day to get the rest?
That's correct - it's 6 tickets per order. You can buy all your Saturday tickets in one order and then buy all your Sunday tickets in a separate order. Hope that helps!

Hey Riot,
Will there be any codes for skins or champions on either of these days? I know it's usually for PAX just curious ! thanks
will there be any viewing parties in NY?
Will alcohol be served, and will it be at ACC prices?
Yeah, the venue will be serving alcohol. The venue is the one who handles all of the concessions so I assume the prices will stay the same.
Can we get an ETA for Worlds tickets?
We'll share more information about tickets for Worlds 2016 this Summer - stay tuned :)
So if your under 13 you need an adult, does that number pertain to people 13 years old as well? Just wondering and I'm a little confused
If you're 13 or older, you do not need to be accompanied by an adult :D
top kek
What does "kek" mean?
Can`t wait especially since it is so close to home.
Can you create a free draw system where let's say, liking your Twitter will enter you in a draw for free tickets?
Second Comment, can I get free tickets?

First comment, can i get free tickets?
